mapper.insert: insert into board (memberid, bno, boardtitle, boardcontent , boardnotice, regdate, writer) values (#{memberid}, BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent}, #{boardnotice}, sysdate, #{writer})
